49 static rs_result rs_patch_s_cmdbyte(rs_job_t *);
50 static rs_result rs_patch_s_params(rs_job_t *);
51 static rs_result rs_patch_s_run(rs_job_t *);
52 static rs_result rs_patch_s_literal(rs_job_t *);
53 static rs_result rs_patch_s_copy(rs_job_t *);
54 static rs_result rs_patch_s_copying(rs_job_t *);

56 
62 static rs_result rs_patch_s_cmdbyte(rs_job_t *job)
63 {
64  rs_result result;
65 
66  if ((result = rs_suck_byte(job, &job->op)) != RS_DONE)
67  return result;
68 
69  job->cmd = &rs_prototab[job->op];
70 
71  rs_trace("got command byte 0x%02x (%s), len_1=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 "", job->op,
72  rs_op_kind_name(job->cmd->kind),
73  PRINTF_CAST_U64(job->cmd->len_1));
74 
75  if (job->cmd->len_1)
76  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_params;
77  else {
78  job->param1 = job->cmd->immediate;
79  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_run;
80  }
81 
82  return RS_RUNNING;
83 }
84 
85 
90 static rs_result rs_patch_s_params(rs_job_t *job)
91 {
92  rs_result result;
93  int len = job->cmd->len_1 + job->cmd->len_2;
94  void *p;
95 
96  assert(len);
97 
98  result = rs_scoop_readahead(job, len, &p);
99  if (result != RS_DONE)
100  return result;
101 
102  /* we now must have LEN bytes buffered */
103  result = rs_suck_netint(job, &job->param1, job->cmd->len_1);
104  /* shouldn't fail, since we already checked */
105  assert(result == RS_DONE);
106 
107  if (job->cmd->len_2) {
108  result = rs_suck_netint(job, &job->param2, job->cmd->len_2);
109  assert(result == RS_DONE);
110  }
111 
112  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_run;
113 
114  return RS_RUNNING;
115 }
116 
117 
118 
122 static rs_result rs_patch_s_run(rs_job_t *job)
123 {
124  rs_trace("running command 0x%x, kind %d", job->op, job->cmd->kind);
125 
126  switch (job->cmd->kind) {
127  case RS_KIND_LITERAL:
128  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_literal;
129  return RS_RUNNING;
130 
131  case RS_KIND_END:
132  return RS_DONE;
133  /* so we exit here; trying to continue causes an error */
134 
135  case RS_KIND_COPY:
136  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_copy;
137  return RS_RUNNING;
138 
139  default:
140  rs_error("bogus command 0x%02x", job->op);
141  return RS_CORRUPT;
142  }
143 }
144 
145 
149 static rs_result rs_patch_s_literal(rs_job_t *job)
150 {
151  rs_long_t len = job->param1;
152 
153  rs_trace("LITERAL(len=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 ")", PRINTF_CAST_U64(len));
154 
155  if (len < 0) {
156  rs_log(RS_LOG_ERR, "invalid length=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 " on LITERAL command", PRINTF_CAST_U64(len));
157  return RS_CORRUPT;
158  }
159 
160  job->stats.lit_cmds++;
161  job->stats.lit_bytes += len;
162  job->stats.lit_cmdbytes += 1 + job->cmd->len_1;
163 
164  rs_tube_copy(job, len);
165 
166  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_cmdbyte;
167  return RS_RUNNING;
168 }
169 
170 
171 
172 static rs_result rs_patch_s_copy(rs_job_t *job)
173 {
174  rs_long_t where, len;
175  rs_stats_t *stats;
176 
177  where = job->param1;
178  len = job->param2;
179 
180  rs_trace("COPY(where=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 ", len=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 ")", PRINTF_CAST_U64(where), PRINTF_CAST_U64(len));
181 
182  if (len < 0) {
183  rs_log(RS_LOG_ERR, "invalid length=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 " on COPY command", PRINTF_CAST_U64(len));
184  return RS_CORRUPT;
185  }
186 
187  if (where < 0) {
188  rs_log(RS_LOG_ERR, "invalid where=" PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 " on COPY command", PRINTF_CAST_U64(where));
189  return RS_CORRUPT;
190  }
191 
192  job->basis_pos = where;
193  job->basis_len = len;
194 
195  stats = &job->stats;
196 
197  stats->copy_cmds++;
198  stats->copy_bytes += len;
199  stats->copy_cmdbytes += 1 + job->cmd->len_1 + job->cmd->len_2;
200 
201  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_copying;
202  return RS_RUNNING;
203 }
204 
205 
210 static rs_result rs_patch_s_copying(rs_job_t *job)
211 {
212  rs_result result;
213  size_t len;
214  void *buf, *ptr;
215  rs_buffers_t *buffs = job->stream;
216 
217  len = job->basis_len;
218 
219  /* copy only as much as will fit in the output buffer, so that we
220  * don't have to block or store the input. */
221  if (len > buffs->avail_out)
222  len = buffs->avail_out;
223 
224  if (!len)
225  return RS_BLOCKED;
226 
227  rs_trace("copy " PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 " bytes from basis at offset " PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 "",
228  PRINTF_CAST_U64(len), PRINTF_CAST_U64(job->basis_pos));
229 
230  ptr = buf = rs_alloc(len, "basis buffer");
231 
232  result = (job->copy_cb)(job->copy_arg, job->basis_pos, &len, &ptr);
233  if (result != RS_DONE)
234  return result;
235  else
236  rs_trace("copy callback returned %s", rs_strerror(result));
237 
238  rs_trace("got " PRINTF_FORMAT_U64 " bytes back from basis callback", PRINTF_CAST_U64(len));
239 
240  memcpy(buffs->next_out, ptr, len);
241 
242  buffs->next_out += len;
243  buffs->avail_out -= len;
244 
245  job->basis_pos += len;
246  job->basis_len -= len;
247 
248  free(buf);
249 
250  if (!job->basis_len) {
251  /* Done! */
252  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_cmdbyte;
253  }
254 
255  return RS_RUNNING;
256 }
257 
258 
262 static rs_result rs_patch_s_header(rs_job_t *job)
263 {
264  int v;
265  rs_result result;
266 
267 
268  if ((result = rs_suck_n4(job, &v)) != RS_DONE)
269  return result;
270 
271  if (v != RS_DELTA_MAGIC) {
272  rs_log(RS_LOG_ERR,
273  "got magic number %#x rather than expected value %#x",
274  v, RS_DELTA_MAGIC);
275  return RS_BAD_MAGIC;
276  } else
277  rs_trace("got patch magic %#x", v);
278 
279 
280  job->statefn = rs_patch_s_cmdbyte;
281 
282  return RS_RUNNING;
283 }

312 rs_job_t *
313 rs_patch_begin(rs_copy_cb *copy_cb, void *copy_arg)
314 {
315  rs_job_t *job = rs_job_new("patch", rs_patch_s_header);
316 
317  job->copy_cb = copy_cb;
318  job->copy_arg = copy_arg;
319 
320  rs_mdfour_begin(&job->output_md4);
321 
322  return job;
323 }
